answers.answer: Legal help available includes pro bono assistance, legal and humanitarian assistance, assistance for obtaining refugee status, resolving civil or administrative legal issues, and complimentary legal counseling.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/legal-help and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Ukrainian refugees can find pro bono legal assistance through the "Lawyers for refugees" campaign via UA.SUPPORT, by asking for help from ACTEDO, accessing the UNHCR phone list of lawyers, or contacting CNRR.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/legal-help and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: The "Lawyers for refugees" campaign aims to provide free legal and humanitarian assistance for Ukrainian refugees.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/legal-help and read the section under 'Lawyers for refugees'.

answers.answer: UA.SUPPORT connects refugees with lawyers by matching Ukrainian refugees seeking legal help with lawyers willing to offer support.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/legal-help and read the section under 'UA.SUPPORT'.

answers.answer: ACTEDO helps refugees resolve problems such as obtaining refugee status or various civil or administrative legal issues they encounter during their stay in Romania.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/legal-help and read the section under 'ACTEDO'.

answers.answer: One can access the UNHCR phone list of lawyers by scanning the provided QR code.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/legal-help and read the section under 'Phone list of lawyers from UNHCR who help refugees'.

answers.answer: CNRR offers complimentary legal counseling to refugees and asylum seekers, providing necessary legal guidance and support for any questions or required legal assistance.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/legal-help and read the section under 'Free Legal Counseling for Refugees and Asylum Seekers'.

answers.answer: Refugees can contact CNRR for legal support through their dedicated hotline at +40730073170, which is also accessible via WhatsApp, Telegram, and Viber.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/legal-help and read the section under 'Free Legal Counseling for Refugees and Asylum Seekers'.

answers.answer: CNRR legal counseling services are available Monday to Friday, from 8:00 AM to 10:00 PM.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/legal-help and read the section under 'Free Legal Counseling for Refugees and Asylum Seekers'.
